title: The Healer
description: The film follows a man with an unwanted gift for healing who meets a teenager with cancer who helps him to find himself.

reviews.text: This movie gave me a headache, it's the most far fetched half assed movie I've ever seen. Would definitely not recommend !!!

I really loved this film. It arrived at a spiritually significant time for me. It’s a movie about grace and redemption. Maybe you’ll like it as much as I did! By the way, I am not conventionally religious. Also , I am not a sap.
